dynamixel

Class XH430

  • java.lang.Object
    • dynamixel.XH430

  • public class XH430
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper library for Dynamixel X series using Protocol 2.0
    Developed by George Profenza for the Interactive Architecture Lab RS201 DynamixelWorkshop
    by Jessica In and Sean Malikides

    This class allows the control of XH430 Dynamxel Smart Servos Currently only tested with XH430-W350-R and XH430-W210-R on OSX and Windows

      • XH430

        public XH430(Serial port,
             int id)
        Constructor: a new instance links a serial port with a servo (id)
        Parameters:
        serialPort - - a serial port that has already been initialized with the port name and baud rate and it's ready to write to
        id - - the servo ID

    • Method Detail

      • setLED

        public void setLED(boolean on)
        Control the built-in LED
        Parameters:
        on - : boolean (true turns the LED on, false turns if off)

      • setTorque

        public void setTorque(boolean on)

      • setGoalPosition

        public void setGoalPosition(int position)
        tell the servo to go to a particular position valid positions are from 0 to 4095 corresponding roughly to degrees 359 to 0 in this order looking at the servo horn (e.g. degrees increase as positions decrease)
        Parameters:
        position - : integer - the servo position to go to

      • degreesToPosition

        public static int degreesToPosition(float degrees)
        Map an angle in degrees to servo goal position
        Parameters:
        degrees - - a floating point value between 0 (to the left when looking to the servo horn) and 180 (to the right when looking to the servo horn)
        Returns:
        an integer between 3071 1024

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        the servo ID

      • setId

        public void setId(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the servo ID to set

      • version

        return the version of the Library.
